title: In Face of Drought, the Netherlands Reverses Course to Save Water
description: As climate change dries out Europe, the Netherlands, a country long shaped by its overabundance of water, is suddenly confronting drought.
dc:creator: Raymond Zhong
media:description: A cargo barge on the severely depleted Rhine River at Lobith, the Netherlands, in August, when the riverâ€™s discharge hit a record low.
